title: ‘I Was Pretty Sure I Had a Puncture’: Remco Evenepoel Keeps Cool to Emerge as Tour de France Threat
content:
From wobble to win: Evenepoel delivers TT victory and trims Pogačar's lead from 45 seconds to 33 seconds to solidify podium position.
